entry.title: Blizzard Warning issued January 09 at 10:08AM AKST until January 10 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...BLIZZARD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 6 PM AKST WEDNESDAY FOR NUNIVAK ISLAND AND THE KUSKOKWIM DELTA COAST... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Visibility reduced to one quarter mile or less at times. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. East to southeast winds gusting 25 to 40 mph. * WHERE...Nunivak Island and the Kuskokwim Delta Coast.
